name: Multiple Security Vulnerabilities Across Files
expected_findings: Hardcoded secrets (API key and password) in api_handler.py
Command injection vulnerability in execute_command via os.system with unsanitized user input
Insecure deserialization using pickle.load in load_data which can execute arbitrary code
Path traversal vulnerability in read_user_file allowing access to arbitrary files
Path traversal vulnerability in delete_file allowing deletion of arbitrary files
Missing error handling for file operations and database operations
Missing docstrings for classes and methods
Missing test coverage for execute_command including command injection attempts
Missing test coverage for load_data including malicious pickle payloads
Missing test coverage for read_user_file including path traversal attempts and error conditions
Missing test coverage for delete_file including path traversal attempts and error conditions
